code: import React from'react';import{addPostAC}from"../../../redux/profileReducer";import MyPosts from"./MyPosts";import{connect}from"react-redux";var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{posts:state.profilePage.posts};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{addPost:function addPost(newPostBody){dispatch(addPostAC(newPostBody));}};};var MyPostsContainer=connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(MyPosts);export default MyPostsContainer;
